message.name: SONAR
message.description: This message encodes the values from the sonar sensor connected to the ADC.
message.field: Timestamp (microseconds, synced to UNIX time or since system boot)
The internal id of the sensor.
The raw value from the sonar sensor read from the ADC.
The measured distance from the sonar sensor.

message.name: COLLISION
message.description: This message contains the filtered and calculated collision information.
message.field: Timestamp (microseconds, synced to UNIX time or since system boot)
collision value in front of the drone.
